Pernah Kesetrum, Ibu Ini Minta Kabel di Halte Mampang Prapatan Dirapikan
03 Nov 2019, 18:17 by Wilda Hayatun Nufus
Jakarta - Seorang ibu bercerita bahwa dia pernah tersetrum kecil ketika melintasi jembatan penyeberangan orang (JPO) di Halte Mampang Prapatan, Jakarta Selatan. Bagaimana ceritanya?
Purwanti (31), pedagang di sekitar Mampang Prapatan, mengaku pernah tersetrum saat melewati JPO Halte TransJakarta Mampang Prapatan ketika hujan mengguyur. Ini karena ada tumpukan kabel yang jaraknya sangat dekat dengan pegangan tangga JPO.
"Kalau musim hujan. Saya pernah kesetrum kayak kesemutan," kata Purwanti saat diwawancarai, Minggu (3/11/2019).
Purwanti mengaku sering berkegiatan di kawasan Mampang Prapatan. Bukan hanya dia, Purwanti menyebut tetangganya juga pernah tersetrum kecil.


Halte Mampang Prapatan (Wilda Hayatun Nafas/detikcom)

"Kadang pernah ada yang kesetrum. Tetanggaku," jelas Purwanti.
"Kayak 'dret', gitu," sebut Purwanti menjelaskan apa yang dia rasa ketika tersetrum.
Purwanti berharap kabel-kabel di dekat JPO Halte Mampang Prapatan itu dirapikan. Dia takut ada korban karena tersetrum kabel ketika musim hujan tiba.
"Pengin dibenerin biar jangan kayak gini-gini nih (sambil menunjuk kabel di samping tangga JPO). Kalau musim hujan kan petir segala itu, takutnya bisa nyambar, kebakar," tutur Purwanti.

Having been electrocuted, this woman asked for a cable at the Mampang Prapatan Stop
Nov. 03 2019, 18:17 by Wilda Hayatun Nufus
Jakarta - A mother told me that she was once electrocuted when crossing a pedestrian crossing bridge (JPO) at Mampang Prapatan Stop, South Jakarta. How is the story?
Purwanti (31), a trader around Mampang Prapatan, claimed to have been electrocuted when passing the Mampang Prapatan Bus Stop JPO when the rain flushed. This is because there is a pile of cables that are very close to the JPO banister.
"In the rainy season. I have been electrocuted like pins and needles," Purwanti said when interviewed on Sunday (3/11/2019).
Purwanti admitted that he often did activities in the Mampang Prapatan area. Not only him, Purwanti said his neighbor had also been electrocuted.


Mampang Prapatan Stop (Wilda Hayatun Nafas / detikcom)

"Sometimes there has been an electric shock. My neighbor," Purwanti explained.
"Like 'dret', that is," Purwanti said explaining what he felt when he was shocked.
Purwanti hopes that the cables near the JPampang Stop Mampang Prapatan are tidied up. He was afraid that there would be victims because they were electrocuted when the rainy season arrived.
"I want to create it so that it doesn't work like this (pointing at the cable next to the JPO stairs). If it is the rainy season, all that, fearing it will catch, fire," Purwanti said.
